subject: Hydrate auth user from /auth/me on init
description: packages/web/src/components/auth/auth-provider.tsx validates accessToken but never updates user data from /api/v1/auth/me. If user is missing/stale in storage, the app stays unauthenticated despite a valid token. Update AuthProvider to setAuth from /auth/me when accessToken is valid (and consider clearing isAuthenticated if no token).
